languages.text: "Благодарю за столь высокое доверие, Лорд-капитан. Я буду и далее оправдывать его".

traits.locale_text: [draft] Благодарит за доверие, верно клянется быть рядом до тех пор, пока будет полезен.
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Thank you for your high trust in me, Lord Captain. I will continue to live up to it."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за столь высокое доверие, Лорд-капитан. Я буду и далее оправдывать его".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your high trust in me, Lord Captain. I will continue to live up to it."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your high trust in me, Lord Captain. I will continue to live up to it."

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your high trust in me, Lord Captain. I will continue to live up to it."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your high trust in me, Lord Captain. I will continue to live up to it."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Danke für Euer großes Vertrauen in mich, Lord Captain. Ich werde ihm weiterhin gerecht werden."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your high trust in me, Lord Captain. I will continue to live up to it."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für Euer großes Vertrauen in mich, Lord Captain. Ich werde ihm weiterhin gerecht werden."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Merci pour l'immense confiance que vous me témoignez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne manquerai pas de m'en montrer digne. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your high trust in me, Lord Captain. I will continue to live up to it."

traits.locale_text: « Merci pour l'immense confiance que vous me témoignez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne manquerai pas de m'en montrer digne. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “感谢您对我的高度信任，舰长大人。我会继续不负重托。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your high trust in me, Lord Captain. I will continue to live up to it."

traits.locale_text: “感谢您对我的高度信任，舰长大人。我会继续不负重托。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの高い信頼に感謝します、ロード・キャプテン。これからもその信頼に応えるよう努力します」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your high trust in me, Lord Captain. I will continue to live up to it."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの高い信頼に感謝します、ロード・キャプテン。これからもその信頼に応えるよう努力します」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Gracias por depositar su confianza en mí, Lord Capitán. Seguiré estando a la altura de ella».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your high trust in me, Lord Captain. I will continue to live up to it."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por depositar su confianza en mí, Lord Capitán. Seguiré estando a la altura de ella».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Thank you for your high trust in me, Lord Captain. I will continue to live up to it."

languages.text: "Bana bu denli güvendiğiniz için minnettarım Lord Kaptan. Güveninizi boşa çıkarmayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your high trust in me, Lord Captain. I will continue to live up to it."

traits.locale_text: "Bana bu denli güvendiğiniz için minnettarım Lord Kaptan. Güveninizi boşa çıkarmayacağım."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
